mapper.insert: insert into user(userId, userPass, userName , userEmail, userPhone, zipCode, address1, address2, address3, address4) values(#{userId}, #{userPass}, #{userName} , #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, #{zipCode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3}, #{address4})
mapper.select: select * from user where userId = #{userId} and userPass = #{userPass}
select userId from user where userId = #{userId}
